content: At the midpoint of our first quarter 2023 estimates, we anticipate the following: Gross margins to improve relative to the previous quarter and come in at approximately 57%; operating expenses on a GAAP basis to decrease relative to the previous quarter and come in at approximately $45 million; operating expenses on a non-GAAP basis to decrease relative to the previous quarter and come in at approximately $40 million; financial income to increase to approximately $4 million due to higher yields on cash reserves, and effective tax rate to return to a normalized level of approximately 14%.
